trans-unit.source: csproj reference | .NET Core SDK
trans-unit.target: csproj 參考 | .NET Core SDK

trans-unit.source: Learn about the differences between existing and .NET Core csproj files
trans-unit.target: 深入了解現有和 .NET Core csproj 檔案之間的差異

trans-unit.source: reference, csproj, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: 參考, csproj, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Additions to csproj format for .NET Core
trans-unit.target: 適用於 .NET Core 之 csproj 格式的新增項目

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概觀

trans-unit.source: This document outlines the changes that were added to the csproj files as part of the move from project.json to csproj and [MSBuild](https://github.com/Microsoft/MSBuild).
trans-unit.target: 此文件概述從 project.json 移動到 csproj 和 [MSBuild](https://github.com/Microsoft/MSBuild) 時，新增至 csproj 檔案的變更。

trans-unit.source: This document outlines **only the deltas to non-core csproj files**.
trans-unit.target: 此文件僅概述**與非核心 csproj 檔案之間的差異**。

trans-unit.source: If you need more information about general project file syntax and reference, please consult [the MSBuild project file]() documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要有關一般專案檔語法以及參考的詳細資訊，請參閱 [MSBuild 專案檔]()文件。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** this document will grow in the future, so please check back to see new additions.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**此文件未來會持續增加內容，所以請回來確認以查看新增的項目。

trans-unit.source: Additions
trans-unit.target: 新增項目

trans-unit.source: PackageReference
trans-unit.target: PackageReference

trans-unit.source: Specifies a NuGet dependency in the project.
trans-unit.target: 在專案中指定 NuGet 相依性。

trans-unit.source: The `Include` attribute specifies the package ID.
trans-unit.target: `Include` 屬性會指定套件識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Version
trans-unit.target: 版本

trans-unit.source: `<Version>` specifies the version of the package to restore.
trans-unit.target: `<Version>` 指定要還原的套件版本。

trans-unit.source: The element respect the rules of the NuGet versioning scheme.
trans-unit.target: 該元素採用 NuGet 版本設定配置的規則。

trans-unit.source: IncludeAssets
trans-unit.target: IncludeAssets

trans-unit.source: `<IncludeAssets>` child element specifies what assets belonging to the package specified by parent `<PackageReference>` should be consumed.
trans-unit.target: `<IncludeAssets>` 子元素指定應該取用屬於由父代 `<PackageReference>` 所指定之套件的何種資產。

trans-unit.source: The element can contain one or more of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 該元素可包含一或多個下列值：

trans-unit.source: Compile � are the contents of the lib folder available to compile against
trans-unit.target: 編譯：可供編譯之 lib 資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: Runtime � are the contents of the runtime folder distributed
trans-unit.target: 執行階段：已散發之執行階段資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: ContentFiles � are the contents of the contentfiles folder used
trans-unit.target: ContentFiles：所使用之 contentfiles 資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: Build � do the props/targets in the build folder get used
trans-unit.target: 組建：使用組建資料夾中的 props/targets

trans-unit.source: Native - are the contents from native assets copied to the output folder for runtime
trans-unit.target: 原生：複製到執行階段輸出資料夾的原生資產內容

trans-unit.source: Analyzers � do the analyzers get used
trans-unit.target: 分析器：使用分析器

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the element can contain:
trans-unit.target: 另外，該元素也可以包含︰

trans-unit.source: None � none of those things get used
trans-unit.target: 無：不使用任何這些項目

trans-unit.source: All � all of those things get used.
trans-unit.target: 全部：使用所有這些項目

trans-unit.source: ExcludeAssets
trans-unit.target: ExcludeAssets

trans-unit.source: `<ExcluseAssets>` child element specifies what assets belonging to the package specified by parent `<PackageReference>` should not be consumed.
trans-unit.target: `<ExcluseAssets>` 子元素指定不應該取用屬於由父代 `<PackageReference>` 所指定之套件的何種資產。

trans-unit.source: The element can contain one or more of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 該元素可包含一或多個下列值：

trans-unit.source: Compile � are the contents of the lib folder available to compile against
trans-unit.target: 編譯：可供編譯之 lib 資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: Runtime � are the contents of the runtime folder distributed
trans-unit.target: 執行階段：已散發之執行階段資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: ContentFiles � are the contents of the contentfiles folder used
trans-unit.target: ContentFiles：所使用之 contentfiles 資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: Build � do the props/targets in the build folder get used
trans-unit.target: 組建：使用組建資料夾中的 props/targets

trans-unit.source: Native - are the contents from native assets copied to the output folder for runtime
trans-unit.target: 原生：複製到執行階段輸出資料夾的原生資產內容

trans-unit.source: Analyzers � do the analyzers get used
trans-unit.target: 分析器：使用分析器

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the element can contain:
trans-unit.target: 另外，該元素也可以包含︰

trans-unit.source: None � none of those things get used
trans-unit.target: 無：不使用任何這些項目

trans-unit.source: All � all of those things get used.
trans-unit.target: 全部：使用所有這些項目

trans-unit.source: PrivateAssets
trans-unit.target: PrivateAssets

trans-unit.source: `<PrivateAssets>` child element specifies what assets belonging to the package specified by parent `<PackageReference>` should be consumed but that they should not flow to the next project.
trans-unit.target: `<PrivateAssets>` 子元素指定應該取用屬於由父代 `<PackageReference>` 所指定之套件的何種資產，但是它們不應該傳遞至下一個專案。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** this is a new term for project.json/xproj `SupressParent` element.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**這是 project.json/xproj `SupressParent` 元素的新詞彙。

trans-unit.source: The element can contain one or more of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 該元素可包含一或多個下列值：

trans-unit.source: Compile � are the contents of the lib folder available to compile against
trans-unit.target: 編譯：可供編譯之 lib 資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: Runtime � are the contents of the runtime folder distributed
trans-unit.target: 執行階段：已散發之執行階段資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: ContentFiles � are the contents of the contentfiles folder used
trans-unit.target: ContentFiles：所使用之 contentfiles 資料夾的內容

trans-unit.source: Build � do the props/targets in the build folder get used
trans-unit.target: 組建：使用組建資料夾中的 props/targets

trans-unit.source: Native - are the contents from native assets copied to the output folder for runtime
trans-unit.target: 原生：複製到執行階段輸出資料夾的原生資產內容

trans-unit.source: Analyzers � do the analyzers get used
trans-unit.target: 分析器：使用分析器

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the element can contain:
trans-unit.target: 另外，該元素也可以包含︰

trans-unit.source: None � none of those things get used
trans-unit.target: 無：不使用任何這些項目

trans-unit.source: All � all of those things get used.
trans-unit.target: 全部：使用所有這些項目

trans-unit.source: DotnetCliToolReference
trans-unit.target: DotnetCliToolReference

trans-unit.source: `<DotnetCliToolReference>` element specifies the CLI tool that the user wants restores in the context of the project.
trans-unit.target: `<DotnetCliToolReference>` 元素指定使用者想要在專案內容中還原的 CLI 工具。

trans-unit.source: It is a replacement for the `tools` node in `project.json`.
trans-unit.target: 它會取代 `project.json` 中的 `tools` 節點。

trans-unit.source: Version
trans-unit.target: 版本

trans-unit.source: `<Version>` specifies the version of the package to restore.
trans-unit.target: `<Version>` 指定要還原的套件版本。

trans-unit.source: The element respect the rules of the NuGet versioning scheme.
trans-unit.target: 該元素採用 NuGet 版本設定配置的規則。

trans-unit.source: RuntimeIdentifiers
trans-unit.target: RuntimeIdentifiers

trans-unit.source: `<RuntimeIdentifiers>` element allows specifying a semicolon-delimited list of [Runtime Identifiers](../../rid-catalog.md) for the project.
trans-unit.target: `<RuntimeIdentifiers>` 元素允許針對專案指定以分號分隔的[執行階段識別碼](../../rid-catalog.md)清單。

trans-unit.source: These allow publishing self-contained deployments.
trans-unit.target: 這些行為允許發行自封式部署。
